name: Trapica
tagline: Automated AI that optimize marketing ads on social
description:
Trapica is an AI-powered algorithms platform for marketeers that manage, optimize targeting and scale up marketing campaigns on social networks, automatically.
We build Trapica to enable our customers to get much more out of their marketing campaigns in an automated way. Our platform is used by DealDash, Shopify, IGN and other Brands, Agencies and Publishers.
